result.eng: The hall was named after Saint Patrick.

result.eng: She was nice at first but she changed the tune after a while.

result.eng: After a stormy night I would go out on the beach.

result.eng: I am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.

result.eng: After that, I love to go to the cinema in Galway once a week.

result.eng: Things were dangerous after the Nazi seizure of power in Germany.
